.
Extension of Convalescent Ratings
Extensions of temporary total awards are authorized under
38 CFR 4.30(b)
when justified by the facts.
A temporary total evaluationÂ awarded for any of the criteria in
38 CFR 4.30(a)(1), (2), or (3)
can be extended to a total duration of six months (in incremental amounts of one, two or three months).
Further extensions of one to six months
beyond the initial six month period
may be made with the following limitations:
entitlement must have been established under
38 CFR 4.30(a)(2) or (3)
(surgery with severe postoperative residuals or immobilization of one or more major joint), and
approval of the VSCM is required.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 8, Section C - Convalescent Ratings Under 38 CFR 4.30
